QuestData.Title: Westward Noble
QuestData.Description: While I am loath to involve you in this further, I don't have the men to afford an escort for Lord Kennings. If he gets hurt, we'll all be out of a job. Can you make sure he at least made it to the west camp?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, you finally made it! I think we have more pressing matters on our hands than hunting deer.
